name: A Game of Bees
description:
Guide the bee through the level to gather nectar from flowers. Click to move the bee. The further away the click, the faster the bee moves. You can't move through a flower too fast though if you want to collected.

The further away you are, the more the wind drains your stamina. Flight skill contracts this.

UI is extra large because this is intended to be played on an Android device.
